msbt.message: This spring breeze feels so nice! My muscles are enjoying it too, .

Your bicep muscles do a lot of work for you when you're swimming.You'll sink right away if you don't hold onto that kickboard while you're doing flutter kicks. Trust me, you want strong arms for anything involving a kickboard.
Fall is a season for sports, good food, and exercise.Oh, the first and last things are kind of the same, What I'm getting at is, work those muscles and enjoy your meals!
If you break a hot sweat outside during winter cold, you won't be cold, . See, move like this, work up a sweat, and<10_4 /> Wait Now I'm cold
You gotta be careful not to catch cold as the seasons change.I'm going to try using my muscles to scare away the germs, .
When I think about summer, tank tops come to mind. They're great for showing off your shoulders. Less shirt, more muscle!
Fall is the season for sports, so I've bumped up the intensity of my training regimen. Huh? My workout plan? That's top-secret, !
This winter I'm kicking my muscle development into overdrive.Then when I get even buffer, it'll be an awesome surprise for everyone. Be ready for it, !
This winter I'm going to develop my muscles even more!I'm starting to get pre-sore already, !
About time the weather warmed up! First things firstâ€”gotta loosen these muscles. Time for a streeeetch!
The warm breeze feels so good! I can feel my triceps comin' outta hibernation.
If you wanna build up a good sweat, summer's always on your side. Gonna get these muscles SHINY!
The best thing about summer? Easy! Dressin' light so everyone can check out how ripped I am, !
The temp's dropping, so I gotta move my body even more to stay warm. Time to build up some heat!
Once it starts gettin' chilly, I can start pushing extra hard without overheating, !
The colder it gets, the more calories I burn! Nothin' beats pumping cold, hard iron, !
You're not skipping leg day just 'cause it's cold, are you? C'mon, no regrets this year! Do it!
